snippet.title: Cricket 22 is OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Bigger, bolder and better than ever, Cricket 22 is OUT NOW on Xbox One and Series X/S, PlayStation 4 and 5 and PC (Nintendo Switch version coming January 2022). 

Enjoy our most in-depth cricket simulation to date, with a narrative-driven career mode, more licenses and ways of playing than ever, and all-new graphics and gameplay mechanics!
